member.summary: MySQL: `column` with @ parameters

member.summary: SQL Server: [column] with @ parameters

member.summary: PostgreSQL: "column" with $ parameters

member.summary: Oracle: "column" with : parameters

member.summary: DB2: "column" with ? parameters

member.summary: SQLite: [column] with $ parameters (distinct from SQL Server)
